metadata.Title: CVE-2019-3829 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A vulnerability was found in gnutls versions from 3.5.8 before 3.6.7. A memory corruption (double free) vulnerability in the certificate verification API. Any client or server application that verifies X.509 certificates with GnuTLS 3.5.8 or later is affected.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-3829` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gnutls-bin - 3.5.18-1ubuntu1.1
libgnutls-dane0 - 3.5.18-1ubuntu1.1
libgnutls-openssl27 - 3.5.18-1ubuntu1.1
libgnutls30 - 3.5.18-1ubuntu1.1
libgnutlsxx28 - 3.5.18-1ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gnutls28 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.5.18-1ubuntu1.1').
